item.title: How can I improve this site?
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“FastBawlz, post:17, topic:253821”][quote author=Ollie link=topic=335325.msg2612702#msg2612702 date=1230842908]. . .
[/quote]

Good point, but the reason I didn’t change it after you told me was not only because I prefer it that way, but quite a few of the people that used the site liked it.
But I guess I’ll compromise and add 2-3px margin inbetween the links.[/quote]It looks much more appealing now.

Read full topic
item.source: How can I improve this site?

item.title: How can I improve this site?
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

[quote=“Ollie, post:16, topic:253821”]i shouldnt have to be told in which ways view a website, should be easy to navigate through and differentiate the different components on the website.

i was only giving my opinion, and that opinion still stands, the links are hard to use. dispite the fact that when you hover over them, when you make a system you are always going to defend it. no matter what other people say, the majority of people will argue that their original way is better and more convinient, even if it isnt, due to the fact that they wrote it and to their eyes looks good. im not saying i have never committed this crime, because i have, it is a fatal flaw in programmers, you should take this (crap) post and use it to your advantage to change. take others input and influence it in your work, because at the end of the day, we are the ones which may use your website.[/quote]

Good point, but the reason I didn’t change it after you told me was not only because I prefer it that way, but quite a few of the people that used the site liked it.
But I guess I’ll compromise and add 2-3px margin inbetween the links.

Read full topic
item.source: How can I improve this site?

item.title: How can I improve this site?
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

[quote=“FastBawlz, post:11, topic:253821”][quote author=Ollie link=topic=335325.msg2609959#msg2609959 date=1230734103]
the links on the top right are hard to differentiate
[/quote]

Not if you hover over them.[/quote]

i shouldnt have to be told in which ways view a website, should be easy to navigate through and differentiate the different components on the website.

i was only giving my opinion, and that opinion still stands, the links are hard to use. dispite the fact that when you hover over them, when you make a system you are always going to defend it. no matter what other people say, the majority of people will argue that their original way is better and more convinient, even if it isnt, due to the fact that they wrote it and to their eyes looks good. im not saying i have never committed this crime, because i have, it is a fatal flaw in programmers, you should take this (crap) post and use it to your advantage to change. take others input and influence it in your work, because at the end of the day, we are the ones which may use your website.

Read full topic

item.title: How can I improve this site?
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

[quote=“sppt, post:6, topic:253821”]Tried something like really light sand-ish yellow?

Anyways, I really like the content box ('cept for the fact that it lacks a BG color), would make something nice for a blog/article kinda thing :)[/quote]

Yeah, the light yellow didn’t really go well with the blue or the white. I just updated it a bit with some magenta and an almost black color for the bg of the content.

And thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: How can I improve this site?
item.dc:creator: @sppt sppt
item.description:
@sppt wrote:

[quote=“FastBawlz, post:5, topic:253821”][quote author=sppt link=topic=335325.msg2609155#msg2609155 date=1230691300]
I’d say change the color of the background of the content box.
The content should be one of those things that should pop right out imo.
[/quote]

Yeah, I can’t think of what color to change it to though.[/quote]
Tried something like really light sand-ish yellow?

Anyways, I really like the content box ('cept for the fact that it lacks a BG color), would make something nice for a blog/article kinda thing

item.title: How can I improve this site?
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

[quote=“OnlyOneRule, post:1, topic:253836”].menu is floating left… as far left as it can go in #head, which has a width of 270px and a margin from the right of 0px, so it is as far left as it can go in body, which has a width of 860px and has an auto margin making it centerd.

That help?

I like the colour scheme by the way ;).[/quote]

Yeah it helped, but I just figured another way to do it.
But now i have a bigger problem.

Do you have MSN?

Read full topic
